name: Telugu Folk Music
description: Traditional Folk Music of the Telugu people, one of the largest ethnolinguistic groups of India, mainly living in the states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.

children.name: Burrakatha
children.description: Traditional form of narrative music, featuring a tambura player paired with two drummers who interrupt the main storyteller to provide additional remarks.
